## FileSystem.createHardLink() method

Creates a hard link. Behind the scenes it uses `fs.linkSync()`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static createHardLink(options: IFileSystemCreateLinkOptions): void;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
